text: Mark Hussey (11 May 1951 â€“ 30 July 2020) was an English professional wrestler. He competed for Joint Promotions, All Star Wrestling and the second BWF as Mark "Rollerball" Rocco and as the original masked Black Tiger in New Japan Pro Wrestling (NJPW) during the 1970s and '80s. He was known for appearing on ITV's World of Sport.Britain's Heroes and Villains by Navdeep Rehill, Grosvenor House, 2013, He was born in Manchester, England. Hussey died on 30 July 2020 at his home in Tenerife, Canary Islands at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English professional wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from Manchester
title: Mark Rocco
